title: Summer Training
description: We provide the best summer training on the latest technologies for B.Tech (CS/IT/EC/EE/ME/CE), BCA, MCA students in June & July.

title: Winter Training
description: We provide the best winter training on the latest technologies for B.Tech (CS/IT/EC/EE/ME/CE), BCA, MCA students in December & January.

title: Vocational Training
description: Softpro Learning Center organizes vocational training for Diploma (CS/IT/EC/EE/ME/CE), PGDCA, PGDWO students every year.

title: Faculty Development Program
description: Industry-academic interaction program to fulfill the production of practical knowledge among faculties.

title: Digital Marketing Training
description: Being a dynamic and technology-driven industry, digital marketing offers a diverse array of employment opportunities.

title: SEO Training
description: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) training is a way to learn strategies and techniques to improve a website's visibility on search engines like Google.

title: SAP Training
description: SAP usually stands for Systems, Applications, and Products in Data Processing. It combines instruction in HR S/W Management.

title: Android and iOS Training
description: Training in Android and iOS development equips you with the skills to build mobile applications for these popular platforms.
